results.title: Customer Retail Associate
results.description: Working flexible hours to suit, we are currently recruiting for Customer Retail Associates to promote merchandise through either online media, retail literature or both.A well known British consumer company whom provides themselves on a strong training program. Team Leaders also required with incomes over in excess of £25k for the ambitious.

Marketing and processing everyday essential merchandise to consumers via online media and/or through retail literature.Team Leader opportunities available for incomes that exceed £25k per annum. Flexible hours requiring the ability to work on your own initiative with training provided.
results.title: Customer Sales Merchandiser
Retail Sales Specialist
results.description: This is an exciting opportunity to join a friendly team, whose purpose is to generate sales within the residential markets.Key Responsibilities will include the following:Deliver to and collect literature from residential markets-Marketing products through social media platforms and other consumer sites-Delivering prepared merchandise and processing orders for direct dispatch-Data entry of merchandise into companies ordering site-Maintaining sales to achieve your bonus-Maintaining good customer…

results.title: Sales Retail Advisor / Manager
results.description: Our client, a well established household name, is looking for Sales Retail Advisors and Team Managers to promote household essentials to residential markets via online media or through retail literature.Full training is provided, so involvement in this industry previously is not required.Income is largely performance based, with massive opportunities to progress.

results.description: Marketing and processing everyday essential merchandise to consumers via online media and/or through retail literature.Team Leader opportunities available for incomes that exceed £25k per annum. Flexible hours requiring the ability to work on your own initiative with training provided.

results.title: Customer Sales Merchandiser
results.description: Marketing and processing everyday essential merchandise to consumers via online media and/or through retail literature.Team Leader opportunities available for incomes that exceed £25k per annum. Flexible hours requiring the ability to work on your own initiative with training provided.

Internet marketing through social media and other online selling platforms. Processing orders either locally or nationally via a well established household British company brand.AND/OR :-Distribution and collection of retail books in your local area, stock ordering and delivery of customer-ordered merchandise. NO cold calling, you do not need any previous experience - full training provided. From approx GBP6.50 per hour rising to GBP20 plus per hour after six months.Team Leader, and then Busine…
results.title: Retail Associates & Team Leaders
Retail Assistant / Manager
results.description: We are recruiting for Retail Assistants and Managers for a well established British, everyday home essentials, company.Positions include online media marketing, residential brochure delivery, merchandise delivery with team management and business leadership opportunities available.Income varies widely, depending on responsibilities and number of hours worked and will discussed in interviews. Training is fully provided.

Working flexible hours to suit, we are currently recruiting for Customer Retail Associates to promote merchandise through either online media, retail literature or both.A well known British consumer company whom provides themselves on a strong training program. Team Leaders also required with incomes over in excess of £25k for the ambitious.
results.title: Customer Retail Associate

results.description: We are currently recruiting for a few customer service representatives and managers who are looking for either part-time or full-time roles.The roles include promoting product merchandise through online media and other online selling tools, and/or utilisting promotional literature to customers in the local area. Working with well known recognised household brands.Opportunities to progress to executive and management levels for the ambitious. Training fully provided for all roles.
results.title: Customer Service Representative / Manager
Retail Assistant / Manager
results.description: We are recruiting for Retail Assistants and Managers for a well established British, everyday home essentials, company.Positions include online media marketing, residential brochure delivery, merchandise delivery with team management and business leadership opportunities available.Income varies widely, depending on responsibilities and number of hours worked and will discussed in interviews. Training is fully provided.

We have a few positions available for those with good customer service skills who also enjoy a sales environment.The role does not require any cold calling, the products market themselves through online media and local literature to residential markets. Our client prides on their strong training programme.Progression opportunities available, with large potential commission incomes to those whom excel with management opportunities existing.
